answers.answer: I just wanted to say that I was originally diagnosed as a Type 2. Because of this forum I was able to realize that I was possibly Type 1. I discussed this with my doctors only to discover I was misdiagnosed. My C-peptide recently revealed I am T1 and I am currently on insulin pump therapy. Thank goodness me, a "T2" was able to find and refer to this forum.

question: I thought this was a forum for type 1 diabetes? I noticed alot of type 2's post on here.  Just curious.
title: Why are there type 2's on this forum?
